response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $10,000 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth more than $8,000 to you at a price that is still significantly higher than what it costs me. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 10000}
